name: Sennheiser Momentum 4
description: Audiophile-grade wireless headphones with 42mm transducers and 60-hour battery. Features adaptive ANC, exceptional sound quality, and premium materials throughout.

reviews.review_text: Sound quality is in a different league. Audiophile approved.
60-hour battery is insane. Charge once a week.
ANC is good but not Sony/Bose level.
